review.reviewtitle: Cant figure out how to play
review.reviewbody: I can't figure out how to play the game instead it just keeps auto-playing for me if anybody knows please tell me.

Press "1" to confirm/start and "p" to pause.
"Ctrl and alt" rotates the pieces. "Arrow keys" moves the pieces and will also used to select things in the menu.
I like to press "tab" and change the controls so instead of "ctrl and alt" it is "z and x".

perfect game to distract yourself from the cruelty of life. I miss her so much.
